name: Sophyrons
description:
SOPHYRONS:

A game for my first game jam: mini game jam 75

Theme: Wisdom.

Limitation: Weight must be the mechanics.

CONTROLS:

  • Space: Jump
  • WASD: Move
  • E: Pickup crystals / Insert crystals into the gate
  • SHFT+E: Drop crystal(from earliest picked) / Remove crystal from gate and equip

HOW TO PLAY:

I designed the levels in a way so it teaches you ez pz,

But in a nutshell, red crystals make you heavier so you won't jump that high, blue crystals make you lighter so you jump very high,

You have to balance your weight, to do platforming stuff and open doors with pressure plates

To finish each level you must collect all the crystals and insert them into the gate

glhf...
